review: The stars might be too low.  So far it is doing all I ask although there was a time when it couldn't connect to the "Home" screen.  Also, when I switch to the HDMI port I'm using on my tv I get a blank screen.  I have to push the center button on the control to get the SLING TV screen up (that's all I'm using it for right now).  I used to go right to the last channel I was watching a couple weeks ago, now it's just a blank screen.  Still, it does what it does so far.
